website_summaries.verdict: Minor quirks aside, these TOMS are attractive and versatile, and will look nice for work, play, and casual events.
pros: Men love these TOMS for they breathable material and simple, slip-on style that compliments a variety of casual looks
Material is flexible and sole is lightly padded to enhanced comfort
cons: The foot bed lining has been known to come loose and slip around when walking
Some say they fit tightly, but also tend to loosen up over time

customer_reviews.title: Best Toms Ever
customer_reviews.text: This would be my 3rd pair of Toms. The first two were the standard toms with the cheap rubber sole bottoms that wore out. These are really cool, have a leather insole and are more comfortable then the other two pairs I had. It is a tie between these and my Van's slipons for the most comfortable footwear. Can't wait to use and abuse these all summer. Will report back later on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Krad

customer_reviews.title: Even nicer in person
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to Toms and have about 10 pair. I bought these for my husband and when I told him he was not thrilled. When they arrived we both fell in love with them. They are really nice, very comfortable and perfect for him to throw on to run errands, etc. which is what we wanted. I think I will get them in another color.
customer_reviews.author: CapeCodder

customer_reviews.title: A lil loose
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11.5 and these fit a little loose I bought another pair in the store and tried on 11 perfect so I got them. I kept these because I like them and they are comfortable. Just gotta wear socks
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Look very nice. I wear them at work and they are comfortable, though I wish these ran in half sizes. I need a 12.5 and I'm wearing a 13.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer from Metropolitan NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good and Comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other Tom's I have owned, it is as little more snug toward the toes. Size was ordered and delivered correct, they make for a comfortable shoe otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity and function
customer_reviews.text: I love how simple these shoes are. I have the canvas variant. I wouldn’t go for long hikes in them but they are great every day shoes. It’s nice to be able to get a shoe that doesn’t incorporate the use of animals.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing since my husband put the shoes on he didn’t take it off I think it’s says all
customer_reviews.author: Orel Bibay

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The fit is loose and they are not very appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sizes run small. I had to order the next half-size up.
customer_reviews.author: StuiePinSoCal

customer_reviews.title: What happened?
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear my Tom's except for driving or around the house and this last pair just started falling apart after about 2 months. I think is going to be my last pair, they just don't seem to be holding up like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: R Wilk
